I understand that with this change all of my currently activated devices will be unprotected by McAfee Security and I will need to reactivate selected devices
All your current McAfee Security protected devices will become unprotected automatically.

To protect your devices again, you'll need to uninstall McAfee Security from all your devices. Spark will send you a notification to support you with this, and the activation and reinstallation on up to 5 devices.
On McAfee Security Standard, you will have less devices you can protect.
